title: Just noticed this small and quite disturbing detail about the loading screen...
body:
Just wondering if anyone else noticed that in the new loading screen for League THAT SWAIN HAS NO NECK. Yes, you heard that right. SWAIN IS MISSING HIS NECK. If you look closely at his bobbing head, you notice that there's a strange void between his head and shoulders. If anyone else noticed this after reading this discussion... Congrats. Now you'll never look at Swain the same way again.
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

replies.body: No, his actual neck is missing above his collar.

You're going to have to point this out.

https://imgur.com/a/jWZa5

Because I see head, a huge mass of neck under his ear, more neck under his chin which is in shadow so it's dark, all disappearing behind a black collar, which in turn disappears behind his armoured shoulders.
In the animated loading screen not the splash art. As his head bobs up from his collar you can see the void where they didn't paint his neck.
Ahhhhhh ok, I thought you were talking about the loading screen for getting into game, not the login screen, mb.
